text: Emmanuel Uduaghan (born on 22 October 1954) is a retired Nigerian politician and doctor. Popularly known as Dr. Emmanuel Ewetan Uguaghan, he was the Governor of Delta State from 2007 to 2015. Before he became Governor, he served as the Commissioner for Health, Delta State and the Secretary to the State Government. title: Emmanuel Uduaghan
